name: Crab Arena 4
description:
A gauntlet for the ages, Crab Arena 4 is back with your favourite crabs and horrible crab puns!  Choose upgrades each round and try to defeat the boss at round 10! Might take a few tries though, luck is needed in this crab eat crab world.

Made for Mini Game Jam #108 by team Pururindo. 

Theme: Seaside, Limitation: Everything dies in one hit

Jiri - Programmer, Designer

Ra Ivl - Programmer, Artist

Javier Ventosa - Sound designer, Musician

P.S. Crab Arena 4 has no prequels.

Thanks for playing c:
